articles.title: WHO urges healthworkers to allow lifesaving mother-baby contact - The Indian Express
articles.description: Newborn babies all over the world have “a right to the life-saving contact they need with their parents”, and this should not be denied due to the COVID-19 pandemic, said Anshu Banerjee, a WHO expert in maternal and newborn health
articles.content: The COVID-19 pandemic is severely affecting the care of sick or premature newborn babies, with many being unnecessarily separated from their mothers and put at risk of death or long-term health probl… [+1722 chars]
